code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Pagination(_ref){var itemsPerPage=_ref.itemsPerPage,totalItems=_ref.totalItems,paginate=_ref.paginate,currentPage=_ref.currentPage;var pageNumbers=[];for(var i=1;i<=Math.ceil(totalItems/itemsPerPage);i++){pageNumbers.push(i);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pagination justify-content-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[currentPage===1?null:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{onClick:function onClick(e){return paginate(e,currentPage-1);},href:"#!",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icon-arrow-left"})})}),pageNumbers.map(function(number){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:currentPage===number?"is-active":null,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{onClick:function onClick(e){return paginate(e,number);},href:"!#",children:number})},number);}),currentPage===pageNumbers[pageNumbers.length-1]?null:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{onClick:function onClick(e){return paginate(e,currentPage+1);},href:"!#",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icon-arrow-right"})})})]})});}export default Pagination;
